name: Outro
_source: speak;MaxYoung;Whew, don't we all make quite a team!
speak;XeconisYoung;How fortunate.|But...{br}We really could have died back there, Max.
speak;EffYoung;Yeah, he doesn't quite like risks, I can't say I disagree.
speak;SkillYoung;Sounds good. Everything is better when it plays into your hands...
speak;MaxYoung;How... cold. Seriously, can we not celebrate at least?
speak;SalYoung;Uh, hold that thought, Cherry...|Now may we speak?
speak;CherryYoung;B-but, why? I thought we were besties!
speak;SalYoung;Father... He was found practicing dark magic...|I don't think we can even show our faces back home...
speak;CherryYoung;...|So you don't care about me at all?|Leaving everything behind? Ugh! Fine!
speak;SalYoung;Now you're being unreasonable, I barely have a choice!
speak;CherryYoung;I'm being unreasonable?!|Great! You care more about honour and that crap than me!
speak;SalYoung;I should probably be going...|You really don't understand, we would lose everything...
speak;SkillYoung;Right, I just HOPE that I can be better than a stupid babysitter someday...
speak;CherryYoung;Be grateful my parents allowed you the courtesy of my company!
speak;MaxYoung;I feel like I wasn't supposed to see that...
speak;EffYoung;Uh, I think we best get going...|I hope you two can make it back safe.
speak;EffYoung;Sorry, my brother would be furious if they knew I was sneaking out...|See you guys!
speak;MaxYoung;Time to make our move then...
speak;XeconisYoung;Wait, where did the lady with the afro go?
speak;MaxYoung;You're wanting a reward? Tsk, tsk.
speak;XeconisYoung;No, just... I want to know who those people were.|But also, you can't deny a bonus would be nice.
speak;MaxYoung;Right. After all, what bandit gang has some pompous moustache knight dude?
speak;XeconisYoung;I think she went that way...
speak;MaxYoung;Hm, now I am itching to know...|Yeah let's stay on her trail!
speak;Cornelius;Oh, hello Sunii. You seem... panicked.
speak;Cornelius;Oh. That.|I'm sorry Sunii, but you know that there's nothing I can do to save you now.
speak;Cornelius;Well, Lanii would appreciate it if you didn't run your putrid mouth, swine.
speak;Cornelius;She will disappear, if you don't hand yourself over.
speak;Sunii;You won't find her.|You can try, but you...
speak;Cornelius;I can assure you, I can and will.
speak;Sunii;You defile the teachings of the Goddess.|You're no better than those you condemn!
speak;Cornelius;...|You may claim to know how what the Goddess desires, but you are but an impure fool.|I will show you to her embrace!
speak;Cornelius;Hmph, you would snoop too close.|No layperson can know the leader's identity and survive.
speak;Sunii;It's okay... the Theon orphanage in Aurelia...|She is...
speak;XeconisYoung;Now hang on! Who was that guy?!
speak;Sunii;I can't...|The moment you know... You're already dead...
